about_the_game:
Welcome to Constraints, the ultimate team-based action game! In this adrenaline-fueled multiplayer experience, you'll join a team of five skilled operatives and engage in heart-pumping battles against enemy forces. With intuitive controls and fast-paced gameplay, you'll need to work together with your teammates to outwit and outgun your opponents, however it goes you will still be rewarded by your own performance.

What sets Constraints apart from other team-based shooters is the that the game is totally free and made by a solo developer, you can enjoy the game without too much of a violent meta shift due to unsettling update rates.

But that's not all – Constraints also features a variety of other game modes to keep things fresh and exciting. From classic team deathmatch to objective-based modes like capture the flag, there's something for every type of player. And with a solo developer at the helm, you can expect a unique and innovative experience that's unlike anything else on the market.

Are you ready to join the fight and become a legend in Constraints? Gather your squad, hone your skills, and get ready for the ultimate multiplayer showdown!
detailed_description:
Important Notice

We want to remember players that this game is made by a Solo-Developer and support of people like you over the past 7 years, but the game is still in a early stage and not free of bugs or other problems. Altough the mechanics at release are quite simple, the game holds complex logic that required years of learning and trials and errors.


About the Game

Welcome to Constraints, the ultimate team-based action game! In this adrenaline-fueled multiplayer experience, you'll join a team of five skilled operatives and engage in heart-pumping battles against enemy forces. With intuitive controls and fast-paced gameplay, you'll need to work together with your teammates to outwit and outgun your opponents, however it goes you will still be rewarded by your own performance. What sets Constraints apart from other team-based shooters is the that the game is totally free and made by a solo developer, you can enjoy the game without too much of a violent meta shift due to unsettling update rates. But that's not all – Constraints also features a variety of other game modes to keep things fresh and exciting. From classic team deathmatch to objective-based modes like capture the flag, there's something for every type of player. And with a solo developer at the helm, you can expect a unique and innovative experience that's unlike anything else on the market. Are you ready to join the fight and become a legend in Constraints? Gather your squad, hone your skills, and get ready for the ultimate multiplayer showdown!

name: Constraints

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3600X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

short_description: The newest free-to-play fantasy 5vs5 team-based sensation.
